title: Parental Advisory Warning Label
content:
What font do they use for this warning label?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140107011849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Parental-Advisory---Explicit-Lyrics-Poster-C10031853_6520.jpeg)
author: zap_rowsdower

comments.content:
Swiss 911 BT ultra compressed, squooshed at about 150% ?

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/swiss-911/ultra-compressed/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140107011849/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/swiss-911/ultra-compressed/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/swiss-911/ultra-compressed/")

EDIT: The word "advisory" squooshed, all others unchanged:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140107011849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-2_3971.gif)
